about_the_game:
A Fantasy Puzzle-Platformer for Co-op Lovers!

Immerse yourself in the spellbinding world of Weeny Wise, where cooperation and exploration are essential to survival! Take on the role of two brave adventurers, Anneli and Hogo, as they explore a vast, magical world filled with hidden secrets, an original lore, and a variety of puzzles and platforming challenges.

Story

The story begins as the dark sorcerer Ragna returns after years, wielding a powerful talisman to rally the Weeny Wise in a war that could endanger the entire human race or Weeny Wise. But yet, there’s a glimmer of hope with Anneli and Hugo, young students at a magical school who survived Ragna’s initial attack. Together, they embark on a quest to find the Four Seals of imprisoned magic, a path that may be their last chance to end Ragna's plans and save both Weeny Wise and humans from war.

Features

As a co-op game, Weeny Wise is played with two main characters. You must, with the help of a friend, navigate through the storyline and game levels. Single-player advancement in the game is not feasible! (It is currently planned that all copies purchased will come with an additional copy you can gift to a friend, at no extra charge!)

Throughout the world of Weeny Wise you will encounter various magical stones. These stones will give you different abilities needed to both advance in the game, and be a good companion!

When you enter the world of Weeny Wise, you will have the opportunity to fully explore the Sentinels' Realm and parts of the Initials and Icicles realms. Use your abilities to uncover hidden items, information, and events as you progress through these magical lands!

Regna has enchanted some creatures to protect her position and you have to hide, escape, or even fight them with the help of your companion and magical abilities.

You can work with your teammates to earn more points and better time in the game, so you can compete with other teams and win various prizes.
